Html:
Hi friends
i need you urgent Assisenatnce. i am using Rich text editor and no doubt it runs super with less effort. i have a small problem while running in the firefox. i am using this line of code
editor.value = richeditor.toHtmlString();
now when firfox consol hit this line of code it show exception and it won't allow my application to run furter. i am not sure how i can handle this situation. i event try to put it as
editor.value = richeditor.text;
but than it says the value is undefine. so please help me guys. i am working on VS2005

Hello,
I do not have much experience with firefox, but the way you describe the problem makes me think that it could be a Page Request Validation issue. A quick way to test this is to set the page validation property to false by doing the following: <%@ Page ... some other stuff ... ValidateRequest="false" %> . If this doesn't do the trick, perhaps someone else can offer advice.
